name: Sheer Cold
description:
End Phase: Deals 1 Cryo DMG to attached character.
Usage(s): 1

When attached character has Blazing Heat attached, remove this effect.
descriptionraw:
<color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> Deals 1 $[K101] to attached character.
<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 1</color>

When attached character has <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C163011]</color> attached, remove this effect.
descriptionreplaced:

<color=#FFFFFFFF><color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>: 1</color>

When attached character has <color=#FFFFFFFF>Blazing Heat</color> attached, remove this effect.
